import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add an attachment."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/chat-gateway/v1/conversations/{conversationId}/attachments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add an attachment that you can later use as a reference when adding a message to the conversation.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"conversationId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Conversation identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"string","example":"125"}},{"name":"X-8x8-Tenant","in":"header","required":false,"description":"Tenant ID, it is going to be mandatory if customer has more than one CC tenant in his organisation.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"string"},"example":"TheTenant"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Defines the file upload request payload.","required":true,"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"attachment":{"type":"string","format":"binary"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
